data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: As the day grows darker and I find myself having to do the weekly shopping it is with glee that I look over my shoulder whilst driving past a petrol pump. What a relic of the recent past, having had to put diesel in my old car and feeling like a slave to the big oil corporations that are stuck in their ways. Nowadays, I go shopping whilst my electric car charges, giving me time and not worrying what my actions impact our environment. To all the naysayers I say just this, don't wack it before you try it.
data.summary: reflecting on the transition from using diesel at a petrol pump to driving an electric car

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: And then she woke up from the dream, or some would call it a nightmare. She was at a Just Stop Oil protest, dressed as a petrol pump, spewing diesel on those who did not believe that we were having an ecological crisis. After her victims were thoroughly soaked she lit them on fire, their screams adding a sparkle to her eyes.
data.summary: protesting against petrol and diesel using a pump costume in a dream

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Sally rode her horse down the canal. She knew her horse was running low on energy so needed to stop soon. She saw a barge selling a variety of things so decided to stop to see if she could refuel. Her pump style shoes were worn out so she had to stay atop her horse whilst speaking to the barge owner. She joked about her horse being neither petrol or diesel but infact, ran on carrots!
data.summary: horse humorously compared to needing petrol or diesel at a pump

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: During one night at my local gym i bumped into Vin Diesel who commented on my abilty to lift my weight correctly. He decided to show me a better way to get my pump on. Whilst given the chance to ask him, i quipped if he had any siblings named after petrol.
data.summary: meeting Vin Diesel at the gym and joking about petrol-themed siblings

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: On a sunny Saturday afternoon, my husband decided we could try and work on getting the long- forgotten project of installing a pump to assist with the borehole that was set up a couple of years back but never used since. Searching through the box that had documents on the setup, I simply could not find the manual. my husband was convinced it was a diesel pump but I strongly remember complaining that petrol prices were too high and almost definite that it was a petrol pump. The battle to figure out which of the two was correct was made harder as we realised that our internet was down. This was going to be a test of the best engineer in the house!
data.summary: debating whether the pump uses petrol or diesel

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: The industrial space ship landed on the docks next to a industrial scale pump, one of many in the area. The planet was one massive resource for petrol and diesel, covered in oil pumps and refineries. The crew of the space ship would spent the next five days here whilst its cargo containers were filled and then they would make the return journey across the milky way back to Earth, transporting their liquid gold back to those that required it fror
data.summary: visiting a planet to pump petrol and diesel for transport back to Earth

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: I was driving my petrol lawnmower whilst maintaining my 3 acres of fields. In a lapse of judgement I accidentally crashed into a water pump that irrigated the farm. Whilst the pump was being repaired, I had to hire a diesel generator to replace the pump.
data.summary: repairing a water pump with a diesel generator after a petrol lawnmower accident

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: One snowy evening, I set off in my mini cooper to my grandparents house, the journey was around 2 hours in length, about half way through i needed to stop to get some fuel. I had a strange loss of my senses and when I got to the pump i had forgotten whether the car took petrol or diesel, in my moment of madness i filled up the car with the wrong type of fuel! I sadly didn't realise until a few minutes into my journey after setting off ahain
data.summary: accidentally pumping the wrong fuel type into a vehicle

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Me and my father run a local petrol station here in the uk. I have an awful habit of smoking, so my dad doesn't let me near the diesel and petrol pumps as he's affraid I could burn the place down. I don't think he's wrong though. He is just looking out for me. I only really work on the till because of this.
data.summary: working at a petrol station but avoiding the diesel and petrol pumps due to smoking habits

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: It was still another 10 miles to the next petrol or diesel pump. I didn't even know what this old battered car took but whatever it was it was running on fumes. I'd soon know about it if it was diesel as i think i heard once that you cant let a diesel tank run drive or the engine would go kaput. Every extra mile the car got was one fewer to the safety and one more away them.
data.summary: running low on fuel and needing to find a petrol or diesel pump

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: I wondered about the puddle of petrol outside my house, near the front door. Had it have been diesel, I would have been less worried. The problem was that I had no idea whether the fuel pump in my vehicle was faulty ot not; the alternative was that someone was out to get me. Although I had few enemies, I knew the most likely culprit, but she was overseas on vacation. Knowing that, I scattered sand on the puddle and stopped worrying.
data.summary: petrol leak causing concern about faulty vehicle pump or potential sabotage

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: The pump for my bicycle broke the other day. It got a puncture. Would you be able to believe the irony, because I certainly wouldn't! This meant that until I could source a new one, or fix that one, I was borrowing and driving my mum's car. The only problem with this, was that the first time I took it to get filled up I was not sure whether it took petrol or diesel...
data.summary: deciding whether the car uses petrol or diesel at the pump

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: the sun was shining, there was a gentle breeze and I was enjoying the drive through the countryside.   i was on my way to join other members of the Petrol Head Club for a fun day out.    I was wearing my favourite Diesel jeans and club T-shirt - i thought i looked great.    i switched radio channels to the Pump fm and sang alon
data.summary: attending a Petrol Head Club event while wearing Diesel jeans and listening to Pump FM

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: I made it a few miles down the road before I heard that terrible noise. The car rolled to a stop by the side of the road and I realised my mistake. I'd put diesel in my petrol car! They were right beside each other at the pump. Now the long wait for the recovery man, how embarrassing!
data.summary: mistakenly putting diesel in a petrol car at the pump

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: The was an oil spill in the park. Petrol, diesel and other flammible liquids from the nearby fuel station had seeped into the ground and were bubbling up between the cracks. Some suggested using big sponges to remove it, but in the end a pump was brought which was able to suck away most of the liquid.
data.summary: using a pump to remove petrol and diesel from an oil spill

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: As I walked along the ruined banks of the polluted river, the stench of diesel was almost overpowering. The devastation of this habitat since the pump had malfunctioned and spewed waste was almost complete. I could have wept in memory of the past beauty that was lost. The glorious verdant and lush vegetation, the dazzling colours of the flowers; even the flash of the petrol blue feathers of a rare kingfisher.
data.summary: environmental damage from a diesel pump malfunction affecting wildlife and habitat

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: A diesel train belts its way through the Highlands. The sun is starting to set and people on board feel sleepy after what seems like a never-ending journey. As the carriages attempt hard to pump their way to the top of the next peak, a strong stench of petrol seeps through the carriages. Smoke starts to bellow through the train as a fire has caught hold.
data.summary: petrol smell and smoke from a diesel train as it struggles to pump uphill

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: not a long time ago and not in a galaxy far far away. no, this story is a lot different than star wars but shares certain elements such as tyranny, oppression, and depreciation of society. the lust for energy, petrol in particular, led to the long-anticipated world war. people tried to stop using vehicles powered by high-carbon emitting substances like diesel, but that was not of use. after a certain point, even though many machinery switched to electricity-fueled engines, people could not find sufficient ways to pump the engines with electricity.
data.summary: a global conflict over petrol and diesel resources leading to societal decline

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: In the mysterious post-apocalyptic land of "Mechanica" there was a severe shortage of petrol. The robots were starting to squeak at the hinges, and the leaders of Mechanica were starting to panic. They heard through the digital grapevine that there may be a way to drill and pump for a new type of digital diesel called "Digisel". However, their usual digital hacker (a robot named Bill) was pretty much keeling over thanks to the petrol shortage, and the codes to access the mystery digital product were looking to be inaccessible.
data.summary: trying to pump Digisel as a substitute for petrol and diesel in a post-apocalyptic world

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: It was my first day of secondary school and after much deliberation on my school outfit I decided on wearing my vintage Diesel jacket. I wanted to give off a cool and edgy look, and reinvent myself for the first day of big school. After checking over my rusty bicycle I realised a had a flat wheel so I used my dads old bike pump to give my wheels a boost! The last thing I wanted was a flat tyre on my first day. I wish my dad could have gave me a lift in, but his petrol car was so battered I would be so embarrassed to turn up in it, I opted for my bicycle.
data.summary: choosing to ride a bicycle instead of using a petrol car due to embarrassment and using a pump to fix a flat tyre

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: The man had quickly realised that he filled his tank with petrol instead of diesel when the engine cut out. Trying to pump it out of his tank was impossible as he had not tools to do so. He tried calling around to see if anyone had a means to fix his problem, but alas he has to call a local garage to pick him and his car up. He was hoping and praying that his car would be able to be fixed. It doesn't look good.
data.summary: accidentally filling a diesel vehicle with petrol at the pump

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: For his next mission, special agent Frank Tomlinson would require a vehicle with a unique modification. In order to arrange this, he went to see his underground mechanic Diesel Dan, who told him that the modification would be difficult, but that he could do it for £100,000. 'When did you pump up the price?', Frank asked, 'last time it was only eighty-thousand!', but Dan pretended not to hear him as he carried on sorting his various barrels of petrol. After handing over the money, Diesel Dan completed the modification and Frank was ready for his mission.
data.summary: arranging a vehicle modification with Diesel Dan while surrounded by petrol barrels

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: What happens when you put diesel into a petrol car? My friend and I decided to find out. He has a petrol car, and I a deisel one, and so we swopped fuels and strated the engine. We had to use our feet to pump the accelerator before anything happened. All seemed to be well, so we wondered why. It turned out we'd forgotten which car was which, and so each vehicle had its correct fuel.
data.summary: experimenting with petrol and diesel fuels but accidentally using the correct pump for each car

data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Unsure which vehicle to purchase from the sparkling showroom, I decided to take a seat in the waiting area, with a coffee to decide. There were both pros and cons to either a petrol or diesel powered vehicle. After careful consideration and finally purchasing my new vehicle, the day had arrived to collect from the showroom. Leaving the forecourt and driving down the road, the underinflated tyre pressure light 'pinged' on the dashboard. Before returning home I nipped into the local garage to inflate the tyre with an air pump to ensure the car was maintained.
data.summary: deciding between petrol and diesel vehicles before visiting a pump to inflate a tyre
